jobsJson.descriptionPlain: As one of Gojek's product pillar, GoLife is the largest integrated lifestyle provider in Indonesia, providing beauty, cleaning, massage, automobile, as well as daily lifestyle services through our verticals i.e. GoGlam, GoClean, GoMassage, GoAuto, GoDaily, GoLaundry & GoFix. We launched our own app in February 2017 and it has been growing rapidly well with over 1.5 million downloads up until now
jobsJson.description: As one of Gojek's product pillar, GoLife is the largest integrated lifestyle provider in Indonesia, providing beauty, cleaning, massage, automobile, as well as daily lifestyle services through our verticals i.e. GoGlam, GoClean, GoMassage, GoAuto, GoDaily, GoLaundry & GoFix. We launched our own app in February 2017 and it has been growing rapidly well with over 1.5 million downloads up until now
jobsJson.additionalPlain:
Gojek is a technology startup based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Specialising in ride-hailing and logistics, we are also the only company in Southeast Asia to be part of Fortune's 50 Companies That Changed the World (2017).

Gojek is a Super App: one app with over 20 services including food delivery, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, massages, and many more.

Gojek is Indonesia’s first and fastest growing unicorn building an on-demand empire. Our total of 2,000,000 driver-partners collectively travel 16.5 million KM daily – making us Indonesia’s de-facto transportation choice.

Gojek is a verb! Gojek is a way of life!

lists.content:
• Develop new features and applications while working closely with QA to ensure a quality end user experience
  • Coordinate with product and UX teams to help scope, design, and estimate features and enhancements being considered
  • Ensure clean coding practices and patterns are used through collaborative code design and review
  • Monitor crash reporting and performance or analytics services to identify trends or spikes of importance or concern

• Minimum 2 years of experience in building web apps using modern HTML5, CSS3, and JS
  • Fundamental understanding of JavaScript
  • Eagerness to work openly and collaboratively with a diverse team
  • Solid computer science fundamentals
  • Knowledge and experience with React JS framework
  • Knowledge and experience with JavaScript testing framework (e.g. Jest, Enzyme)
  • Experience in web development (e.g. Single Page App, development) Good understanding of layout and basic UI
  • Experience in lean/XP development methods (TDD, Pair Programming, Scrum, Kanban, Continuous Integration/Delivery)
